headline: Perdue kicks off his Stop Stacey campaign with a promise of an election fraud police force
author: Rebekah Sager
sentences:
Gubernatorial candidate David Perdue (R-GA)
Today kicks off the shortest month of the year, Chinese New Year, and Black History Month, so what better day for a racist Republican Southerner such as Georgia gubernatorial candidate David Perdue to kick off his campaign tour, titled Stop Stacey, aimed at preventing Stacey Abrams from being elected the states first-ever Black woman governor.

After her bitter and contested run in 2018, the top-ranking Georgia Democrat famously turned her focus to voting rights to ensure all Americans were able to cast a ballot, via programs such as Fair Fight 2020, where she raised millions for then-Senate candidates Ossoff and Raphael Warnock and registered a staggering 800,000 voters.

Trump-endorsed David Perdue kicked off his Stop Stacey tour in his campaign for GA Gov today by pledging to create a special election fraud police force, and requiring audits after every election.
Perdues also running with a proposed election law enforcement division inside the Georgia Bureau of Investigation, complete with an outside auditing process to ensure voting integrity in the state.
Should Perdue beat Kemp, he will face the Democratic candidate Stacey Abrams, who Trump calls The Hoax, presumably because he cant believe a Black woman can be so badass and real at the same time.
The only integrity issues that I see are those involving Republicans such as Perdue who support voter suppression as it relates to Black and brown communities being able to vote.
